phrases: I braided it the other day, too.
You just let her do what she wants, huh.
I love your hair like that!
You should keep it that way!
Oh, Hori-san did it for you?
Man, your face is so tiny and cute, too!
Hey, can I have my bag?
Is it because of those girls?
They treated you like you were invisible before,
but as soon as you cut your hair, oh, now they see you!
And they keep putting their paws all over you right in front of me!
He is all gloomy and depressing.
Whoa, I totally could not tell.
Dude, you are such an ass.
Glad you guys are doing okay, too, Tanihara.
Ugh, when you say my name, it totally skeeves me out.
What, did you finally grow a pair in high school?
You having some weak-ass chick carry your bag?
Oh, hey, are you his girlfriend?
Do you know what he was like in middle school?
He was so emo and always by himself!
I am asking if you guys are done talking.
If you are, then piss off, assholes.
I mean, I was already in a crappy mood,
but then they started treating you like that.
How was I supposed to hold back?
Seriously, I cannot believe they were so mean to you!
It is Hard, but Not Impossible
A small fry and a drink.
Did you start taking karate classes or something?
Did not you use to tease him back in middle school?
Y'know, there was this chick with him.
I think she was his girlfriend.
You should probably stop teasing him like you did back then.
Miyamura's really leveled up his DEF stats.
What, is his girlfriend his summon or something?
He says he does not care about him, but he keeps bothering him.
He just cannot get him out of his head.
I have someone who will get mad on my behalf.
She is right here with me.
You did it before, just do it again, like bam!
That is the least punchable face ever.
C'mon, she is begging you, Miyamura!
Where the hell did you come from, Shindo?!
I was just going to stalk you from afar,
but you were being so mean to Hori-san that I just could not just watch!
What kind of man are you?!
You have no idea what is going on.
I mean, it is probably something sexual, right?
Aww, what, do you not love me anymore?
Hey, I can help you instead!
Whatever you want, I am here.
Or am I the wrong man for the job?
It is got to be Miyamura.
Do you even have a brain in there, dude?!
And this is not anything sexual, got it?!
Ooh, can we go by the convenience store, Miyamura?
Whoa, who put a stick up your ass?
Stop loitering in the parking lot, morons.
How about you take your bitch ass and-
Do not talk to her like that, you moron!
Why are you yelling at me?!
Dude, if you would pissed her off, she would have bashed our skulls in!
Next time I see that guy-
Next time I see that guy-
You sure took your time, bitch!
You sure took your time, bitch!
What the hell happened to you guys?
I do not mean to kinkshame, but...
Is she right in the head?
I am just going to stop thinking about it.
Miyamura sure has changed, like damn.
He barely talked back to us in middle school, and now he is hitting girls?
I cannot believe I have to say this, but this is my house, too.
Could I ask you for your advice?
Shut it, it is time for a man-to-man!
Why are we in the bathroom?
I had a question for you about Hori-san.
No, no, just... she really likes it when I get mad and yell at her.
Is that her kink or something?
Is that her kink or something?
That is what I thought, too.
That is what I thought, too.
Maybe it is just'because it is the exact opposite of how you normally act?
Like if you got all dressed up to go to the office?
Like if you got all dressed up to go to the office?
Think of it like taming a fierce golem!
How am I supposed to bathe?
But look how sad and worried Miyamura-kun is!
Miyamura-kun's trying so hard to live up to your expectations!
I do not need you to lecture me here!
Stop blabbing about stupid crap and help out with the chores for once!
Hey, I made curry the other day!
All you did was microwave it!
But you said it was yummy!
Yeah, because they make the prepackaged stuff yummy!
Do not strip in front of me, moron!
So I went to karaoke with Shu the other day.
All he ever sings are enka songs and rap.
He sure does listen to everything, huh.
I know he listens to Western pop, too, but damn...
Apparently he has a crush on Hori-san.
Damn, how many guys want to be with her now?
Damn, how many guys want to be with her now?
There is one thing I know about crushing on Hori-san...
Do not fall for her unless you really mean it.
Do not fall for her unless you really mean it.
Speaking of Hori, where is she at?
The student council room, I think.
Oh, I do not have my phone.
Did you leave it in the science lab?
Did you forget something, too, Mizouchi-kun?
Why would it be in there?
Well, nobody else has had class in here since we did,
so it is got to still be in here somewhere.
It was in your pocket the whole time?
Wait, why is the screen all black?
How did you break it two seconds later?!
Why the hell is she with you?!
If you had to... could you punch Hori-san?
Then you could never be with her.
Toru told me you are always leaving it all over the place.
You would better be more careful with your-
I thought you were the kind of guy who could never stand up for himself.
I thought you were some loser.
But guess it is easy for you to be confident around your girlfriend, huh?
Whoa, why are your eyes all red?!
Were you rubbing them or something?!
Go away, there is not enough room!
The only free space there is.
This locker or whatever is not outside at all!
This is what it is like outside.
You have always been on the inside, so you do not know how it feels.
Inside, outside, what the hell are you on about?
You are the one who brought it up.
I think this is the first time we have ever talked like this.
Do you not like tight spaces?
Do you like being on the inside?
Even if there is nobody on the inside?
If all the people on the inside with you came outside,
then you would be all alone in there.
You do not care if you are inside or outside.
You just care that people are there with you.
People who are on your side.
Yeah, I have it, but why do you want it?
Does not matter, just tell me.
Everyone knew the rabbits liked Miyamura better than anyone.
Why are we talking about rabbits?
Could you go take the sign in?
Sorry, we will be closed tomorrow, too, but we will be open the day after...
If you turn the corner and go down for a bit, you will find another cake shop.
You will find a much bigger bakery that is probably still open now.
It is fine, I will come back the day after tomorrow.
See you in two days, then.
Then I will get that one, too.
I am going to go get it fixed tomorrow.
I totally thought he was ignoring me...
I was the one ignoring him all this time.
Even though I was supposed to.
By end of summer break, they were all dead.
I was the one who told everyone it was your fault.
What if I would been able to tell him back then?
It hurts my heart to think about it.
Oh, that is from middle school.
What did she look like back then?
Peek and you are a dead man.
They are big, and in the way, but you do not actually want to throw them away...
Did you throw yours away already, Miyamura?
Did you throw yours away already, Miyamura?
But they are so huge and heavy, I did not know what to do with them,
so I just ended up keeping them.
Now, though, they are actually pretty important to me.
Back then, Miyamura must have wanted to throw it all away.
I do not know what he was like back in middle school,
but I get the feeling that he hated everything and was just drifting along.
That that is what life was like for him.
But now, he can look back and feel glad that he did not throw it all away.
Wonder what Katagiri's yearbook is going to look like.
Guess we will find out when we get it.
They took the pictures for it back in April, right?
I hope they got a picture of me with Mizouchi-kun.
We have kind of gotten close lately.
He helped me find my phone.
He was kind of mean to me before, but it is all good.
Does he get off on that?
I think I might get along with Tanihara-kun, too.
but I do not think there is a person in the world
you cannot eventually be friends with.
Next Time: Until the Snow Melts
